Classes

class  vpgl_affine_fundamental_matrix< T >

Detailed Description

A class for the fundamental matrix between two affine cameras.

Author:
Thomas Pollard
Date:
June 8, 2005
Author:
Joseph Mundy, Matt Leotta, Vishal Jain

The fundamental matrix has the form: 

   | 0  0  e |
   | 0  0  d |
   | a  b  c |
